name: At Knights fall (Saphiroths)
description:
Summary:

Set in a medieval fantasy world where magic has become the most prominent tool for mankind. You are a wizard of great prestige and known as the hero of the lands. You are admired as the one who slayed the greatest evil Emerson Worthame. Emerson Worthame was once a mage who dabbled in the darker magics, but was soon corrupted by it. 

This experiment turned him into a amalgamation of rot and despair. Upon slaying this horrid creature a small spec of his being escapes your grasps and flees into the depths of the earth. He enters a slumber and spreads his energy through the soil to all edges of the world. 

Like a plague, people and towns start to deteriorate. And although you tried to stop the plague from weakening you through magic, it has no effect. You feel yourself weakening by the day and feel the pressure of not being able to defend the people you have fought for so rigorously all these years.

Your journey starts in Gilramore a city of wealth and prosperity where you set out on a journey to save mankind with the strength you have left.

Controls:

WASD - Movement
Spacebar - Dash
LMB - Cast spell
1, 2 - Switching spells
